text: Ra yini bhandachan ki hami ta kehi dina matra narkama basne chaum. Tiniharusita bhanah ke timiharule allahasamga kunai vacana li'eka chau? Yadi cha bhane nihsandeha allaha aphno vacanako ullanghana kahilyai gardaina, baru timile ta allahako barema yasta kura bhandachau jasako sambandhama timila'i kehi jnana chaina
